languages.text: "Я благодарен за позволение служить вам на вашем корабле и за столь щедрый дар я бы хотел отплатить вам..." {n}Вицент коротко оглядывается на семью прежде, чем продолжить.{/n} "Видите ли, я питаю особенные, нежные чувства к Астарции Версериан. Думаю, я знаю кое-что, что может спасти ее от смерти, хоть и поставит под удар мою собственную семью".

traits.locale_text: "Я благодарен за позволение служить вам на вашем корабле и за столь щедрый дар я бы хотел отплатить вам..." {n}Вицент коротко оглядывается на семью прежде, чем продолжить.{/n} "Видите ли, я питаю особенные, нежные чувства к Астарции Версериан. Думаю, я знаю кое-что, что может спасти ее от смерти, хоть и поставит под удар мою собственную семью".
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

Думаю, я знаю кое-что, что может спасти ее от смерти, хоть и поставит под удар мою собственную семью".

I think I know something that can help her escape death, and also jeopardize my own family."

I think I know something that can help her escape death while also jeopardising my own family."

I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: 「陛下の船に同乗してお仕えする機会をいただき、感謝しております。その寛大なお心に必ずやお応えいたします…」{n}ヴィセントは家族の方を振り返ってから、発言を続ける。{/n}「ご存知でしょうが、私はアスタルチア・ウェルザリアンに特別、愛おしい感情を抱いています。彼女が死を免れうる情報を知っているのですが、それは我が家を危険に晒すことにもなるのです」
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の船に同乗してお仕えする機会をいただき、感謝しております。その寛大なお心に必ずやお応えいたします…」{n}ヴィセントは家族の方を振り返ってから、発言を続ける。{/n}「ご存知でしょうが、私はアスタルチア・ウェルザリアンに特別、愛おしい感情を抱いています。彼女が死を免れうる情報を知っているのですが、それは我が家を危険に晒すことにもなるのです」
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: “我很感激有机会在您的飞船上为您效劳，也希望能报答您的赏识之恩……”{n}文森特回头看了一眼他的族人，继续说道。{/n}“您知道，我对艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森怀着特殊的情谊。我知道某些事情，我的证词或许可以帮助她摆脱被处死的厄运，但可能会危害我自己家族的利益……”
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: “我很感激有机会在您的飞船上为您效劳，也希望能报答您的赏识之恩……”{n}文森特回头看了一眼他的族人，继续说道。{/n}“您知道，我对艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森怀着特殊的情谊。我知道某些事情，我的证词或许可以帮助她摆脱被处死的厄运，但也可能危害我自己家族的利益……”
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: « Je vous suis extrêmement reconnaissant de m'avoir pris à votre service, et je voulais vous remercier de votre bienveillance... » {n}Vicent jette un coup d'œil en direction de sa famille avant de continuer en baissant d'un ton.{/n} « J'éprouve quelque sentiment pour Astartia Werserian, voyez-vous. Et je pense savoir quelque chose qui pourrait lui éviter l'exécution. Quelque chose qui pourrait en revanche mettre ma propre famille en péril. »
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous suis extrêmement reconnaissant de m'avoir pris à votre service, et je voulais vous remercier de votre bienveillance... » {n}Vicent jette un coup d'œil en direction de sa famille avant de continuer en baissant d'un ton.{/n} « J'éprouve quelque sentiment pour Astartia Werserian, voyez-vous. Et je pense savoir quelque chose qui pourrait lui éviter l'exécution. Quelque chose qui pourrait en revanche mettre ma propre famille en péril. »
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: «Le agradezco la oportunidad de servirle a bordo de su nave y me gustaría devolverle tanta generosidad...». {n}Vicent mira a su familia antes de continuar.{/n} «Verá, albergo sentimientos especiales hacia Astartia Werserian. Creo que sé de algo que puede ayudarla a evitar la muerte, aunque revelarlo puede poner en peligro a mi propia familia».
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: «Le agradezco la oportunidad de servirle a bordo de su nave y me gustaría devolverle tanta generosidad..." {n}Vicent mira a su familia antes de continuar.{/n} «Verá, albergo sentimientos especiales hacia Astartia Werserian. Creo que sé de algo que puede ayudarla a evitar la muerte, aun poniendo en peligro a mi propia familia».
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Ich bin dankbar für die Gelegenheit, an Bord Eures Schiffes zu dienen, und möchte mich für Eure Großzügigkeit revanchieren ..." {n}Vicent blickt zu seiner Familie, bevor er fortfährt.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich hege besondere, zärtliche Gefühle gegenüber Astartia Werserian. Ich glaube, ich weiß etwas, was ihr helfen kann, dem Tod zu entgehen. Doch es preiszugeben, würde auch meine eigene Familie gefährden."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin dankbar für die Gelegenheit, an Bord Eures Schiffes zu dienen, und möchte mich für Eure Großzügigkeit revanchieren ..." {n}Vicent blickt zu seiner Familie, bevor er fortfährt.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, ich hege besondere, zärtliche Gefühle gegenüber Astartia Werserian. Ich glaube, ich weiß etwas, was ihr helfen kann, dem Tod zu entgehen ... was aber auch meine eigene Familie gefährden würde."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Geminizde hizmet etme fırsatını bana sunduğunuz için minnettarım. Fakat bu borç teşekkürle ödenmez..." {n}Vicent, devam etmeden evvel hane mensuplarına bakıyor.{/n} "Efendim, Astartia Werserian'a karşı özel hisler beslemekteyim. Onu ölümden kurtaracak fakat kendi hanemi tehlikeye atacak bir malumata sahip olduğumu düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful for the opportunity to serve you on board your ship and would like to repay you for such largesse..." {n}Vicent looks back at his family before continuing.{/n} "You see, I harbour special, tender feelings toward Astartia Werserian. I think I know something that can help her escape death, though revealing it may jeopardise my own family."

traits.locale_text: "Geminizde hizmet etme fırsatını bana sunduğunuz için minnettarım. Fakat bu borç teşekkürle ödenmez..." {n}Vicent, devam etmeden evvel hane üyelerine bakıyor.{/n} "Efendim, Astartia Werserian'a karşı özel duygular beslemekteyim. Onu ölümden kurtaracak fakat benim hanemi tehlikeye atacak bir malumata sahip olduğumu düşünüyorum."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak
